survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Cleaning Robots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart home cleaning robots to evaluate satisfaction, identify pain points, and understand feature preferences.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently on your smart home cleaning robot? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify popular features. Ensure clear differentiation between options.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently on your smart home cleaning robot? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your smart home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your smart home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart home cleaning robot to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart home cleaning robot to others?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future smart home cleaning robots?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather ideas for product improvement. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future smart home cleaning robots?
